vocabinfos.mediumDef:
: watering(ANIMALS/PLANTS)
1) to give to drink, irrigate, drink, water, cause to drink water
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) to water, irrigate
1a2) to water, give drink to
1b) (Pual) to be watered
1c) (Niphal) variant
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) pu.   estar humedecido; (b) hif.   hacer beber
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 給...喝, 喝, 澆水, 灌溉, 使之喝水
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) 澆水, 灌溉,
1a2) 澆水, 給飲料喝
1b) (Pual) 被灌溉
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 给...喝, 喝, 浇水, 灌溉, 使之喝水
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) 浇水, 灌溉,
1a2) 浇水, 给饮料喝
1b) (Pual) 被灌溉
